content.description: A two-dimensional array myArray is to be created with the following contents.
content.question: {{0, 0, 3}, {0, 0, 0}, {7, 0, 0}} Which of the following code segments can be used to correctly create and initialize myArray ? int[][] myArray = new int[3][3]; myArray[0][2] = 3; myArray[2][0] = 7; int[][] myArray = new int[3][3]; myArray[0][2] = 7; myArray[2][0] = 3; int[][] myArray = {{0, 0, 3}, {0, 0, 0}, {7, 0, 0}};

skill.text: 2.B: Write program code involving data abstractions.
